body.name: Elaine Karen 6-Pack Vinyl Allergy Pillow Protectors - Standard Size Zippered Pillow Covers - 100% Waterproof, Bedbug Proof, Dust Mite Proof - Washable and Reusable Pillow Encasement Covers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 13 mins
features: HEAVY-DUTY VINYL PILLOW PROTECTOR - The strong binding stitches and extra-durable seams create a solid barrier against liquid spillage, bedbugs, dust mites, and other allergens. It also prevents pillow stains by wicking away moisture, like sweat and other bodily fluids.

ZIPPER FOR FULL PILLOW PROTECTION - The integrated zipper effectively seals your pillow inside the cover for total waterproof, bedbug-proof, and dust-mite-proof protection. This ensures that no allergens can pass through the pillow encasement - giving you a comfortable and restful sleep.

LOW MAINTENANCE PILLOW CASES - Unlike most vinyl pillow covers that are one-time use, Elaine Karen's are 100% reusable. They are safe for machine washing but easily cleaned through handwashing or by wiping it clean with a damp cloth - perfect for hospital, hotel, and everyday use.

RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS - Bedbug exterminators and many pros recommend using a bedbug protector pillow to prevent further infestation. And a Vinyl Pillow Protector makes an inexpensive way to manage bedding protection and common allergies.

GREAT VALUE PACK, SET OF 6 - Each set contains six Standard Size Vinyl Pillow Case Covers that are backed with Elaine Karen's Satisfaction Guarantee. If by any chance you are not satisfied with your purchase, connect with us, and we will resolve it immediately.
body.description: Elaine Karen Vinyl Pillow Protectors Elaine Karen’s Vinyl Pillow Protectors are an inexpensive way to manage dust mite and bed bug infestation and common conditions brought by such allergens. By adding a protective barrier to your pillows, you can ensure a more comfortable and restful sleep. What People Love these Pillow Covers? More than the fact that they are very affordable, these pillowcases do what a pillow protector is supposed to do. They work 2 jobs by keeping your pillows safe from stains and bugs while keeping you protected against allergens. Aside from that, here are the features that make Elaine Karen’s Vinyl Pillow Encasement a must-have: Made with Heavy-Duty Vinyl With its strong stitches and extra-durable seams, our pillowcases create a solid surface that is impossible to be penetrated with liquid spills, bed bugs, and dust mites. Thus, you can ensure that whatever’s inside the case stays inside, what’s outside stays out. Therefore, we can say that our Pillow Protectors are 100% Waterproof, Bedbug-Proof, and Dust-Mite-Proof! Total Protection with Zipper Enclosure To ensure effectiveness in wicking away bodily fluids, liquid spillage, and allergens, we integrate our pillow covers with a rust-proof zipper enclosure. Now, everything’s sealed for maximum bedding protection! Washable and Reusable Most manufacturers designed their Vinyl Pillowcases for single use. But not with Elaine Karen’s! Our Pillowcases can be washed and reused multiple times. Plus, they are super easy to clean. They are safe for machine washing and handwashing. They even easily wipe clean with a damp cloth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The vinyl feels durable & protective yet, is pliable & soft enough
reviews.reviewText: I bring my own pillows when I spend a few months house sitting for someone who has a sweet dog that I have a very mild allergic reaction to.I want my inner pillow materials "sealed" & protected from any dander, fur or other allergens.I read some comments (they were fyi's, not really complaints) about the air getting trapped for a bit as you lay your head down. Makes sense if the zipper zips completely to the end without any gaps. It would defeat my confidence of protection if the air freely escapes.On that note, I ordered larger cases to allow more room for trapped air billowing & bubbling as I lay my head down (Initially, I also pressed out all the excess air before zipping closed...so far, that has helped the issue but, not sure for how long.)I also put TWO fabric cases over the vinyl case to muffle/lessen any soft plastic-y sound, adding an extra fabric layer to cushion the feel & sound. This also helps mask that mild "new" vinyl scent which I expect to fade away in a day or so.My main goal of well protected pillows seems to have been met therefore, any slight sound I hear, hasn't bothered me at all.So far, I have no complaints about this purchase.I'll update this review if the durability disappoints with tears or malfunctioning zippers.I don't really expect any vinyl, soft enough for comfort & with a sewn in zipper, to withstand nightly pillow use or in my case abuse, lol ...but, I do expect it to last long enough to be worth the money I put into it!ZZZzzzzz G'Night :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow cover!
reviews.reviewText: These pillow covers were purchased for multiple reasons; to cover bed pillows and complete a project for a baby changer. They worked out perfectly for both. They are quiet when lying on them and easy to wipe off and disinfect. They are made well for the price. I would definitely recommend these covers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Well Made Case.
reviews.reviewText: Well made and no issues so far. The price is a little too high I think. $1.15 less would be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: Product is Great , But shipping was a mess. changed delivery time 3times one came one day another 2 days then 3or more days later before we got them all. we had to change our time for delivery . may want to work on that. But over all Happy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for 6 vinyl pillow covers!
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought these waterproof covers to cover our 6 cat beds. We can't seem to get all the hair off when we clean & wash them, but now we only have to take them outside & shake them & wipe them off! TAnd they are completely waterproof! If you're using tgem on a regular pillow you might want to use 2 pillow cases since they are all vinyl. That's what we do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unimpressed and disappointed
reviews.reviewText: As I have children with allergies and we've had 2 neighbors come up with bedbugs, I decided to order some of these. As a household of 8 with at least 2 pillows for each person, I had to buy multiple packs. But boy was I disappointed and unimpressed when each pack had at least 1 cover with a hole already in them. Some even ripped open when sticking pillows (which were smaller than description recommended) inside. Had 2 bust open from just laying your head on them. But I decided to tough it out with the ones that stayed together. Which wasn't bad until approximately 2 weeks in and even those started ripping open. So, instead of letting money go to waste, I clear taped the holes. Only for another sem to open up a little later. So all in all it's either trash them or tape them up. (Which we have.) Now if the producer would just make the product a bit bigger and stop stitching the sem so close to the edge, the product might actually hold together and be worth it. Hope this helps someone save their money and time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good pillow cases.
reviews.reviewText: The guess at my Airbnb said they are noisy and sounds like a plastic bag. Will never buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Being a huge germaphobe, these go with me whenever I travel. They fit a regular sized pillow perfectly and zipper close completely. No issue with sweating either. I highly recommend!
right size, pillows stays like new.

These covers are great. The material is thick and durable for cleaning. The size of the case fits my queen size pillows (27 inches long) where most covers will only fit a standard pillow. I've only been using them in my practice for a couple weeks but so far so good.
Easy to use. Bought to cover pillows for ease of cleaning in my massage practice.
They are ok. Paid a lot of money for them. Will see how long they last in my practice.
These ripped along the seams after I had them for 1 month. Skip this product and spend more money for a longer lasting product. I ended up buying Oak Works pillow covers to replace these.
